turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need an el diablo pizza, I need a Mediterranean, and I need the five-cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need them all to be small and I need them all to be thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what was the last pizza you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It was the five cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and where are you ordering from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We are ordering to a local Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good, i see bella luna's has something similar to el diablo pizza with sriacha, chicken and peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have 3 small thin crust pizzas, 1 5 cheese, 1 mediterannean, 1 spicy chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Thank you for verifying.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, the cost will be $42 is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We need that one for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me check to see when it will be ready for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like it'll be ready in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
